application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
description: x 2 Turkish Hazels (applicant's ref. G1) - Lift 4 Meters to main stem; x 3 False Acacia (applicant's ref. G2) Cut overhang to clear graves; x 2 Dead Sycamores (applicant's ref. G3) - Fell; x 1 Dead Elm (applicant's ref. G3) - Fell; x 1 Sycamore (applicant's ref. T4) - Remove deadwood;  x 1 Dead Horse Chestnut Mature (applicant's ref. T5) -  Fell; x 1 Acacia (applicant's ref. T6) - Remove deadwood; x 1 (applicant's ref. T7) - Cut overhang by 2 M to clear graves; x 1  Silver Birch (applicant's ref. T8) - Cut overhang to clear school.  All standing in area A1 of Tree Preservation Order.
